CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Data_Collection_Complete__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Data_Collection_Complete__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Data_Collection_Complete_Target__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Data_Collection_Complete_Target__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Days Completed Early Post
